Posts.Content: I am new to this site and wondered if anyone was using the cold cap during chemotherapy?  I have had one round of EC chemo and am about to have my second on Monday 24th of June 2013.  I still have my hair but only wash it once a week and can't style it.  This morning I started shedding hair.  Only strands, not clumps but it was noticeable.  Anyone else had this experience and still managed to hold onto their hair?
